rows.label: qst201323_msg0004
rows.name:
If it were just a matter of defeating
the enemy, there would be no issue. But
this time, the children are present.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0005
rows.name:
If the rescue takes too long, they
may be taken hostage or harmed.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0007
rows.name:
That's true, but... We don't have
time to just stand and watch.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0008
rows.name:
I agree. Therefore, let's
split into two groups.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0009
rows.name:
I will act as a decoy to
draw the enemy's attention.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0010
rows.name:
While I do so, please
rescue the children.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0011
rows.name: Will you be okay on your own, Tokiha?

rows.label: qst201323_msg0012
rows.name:
I will be fine. I
promise I will return.

rows.label: qst201323_msg0014
rows.name: Yes... I wish you luck as well.
